com.fluidops.fedx
Class QueryManager

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.fedx.QueryManager

public class QueryManager
extends java.lang.Object

QueryManager to manage queries. a) Management of running queries (abort, finish) b) Factory to create queries

Author:
Andreas Schwarte

addPrefixDeclaration

public void addPrefixDeclaration(java.lang.String prefix,
                                 java.lang.String namespace)
Register a prefix declaration to be used during query evaluation. If a known prefix is used in a query, it is substituted in the parsing step. If prefix is null, the corresponding entry is removed.

Parameters:
prefix - a common prefix, e.g. rdf
namespace - the corresponding namespace, e.g. "http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"

prepareTupleQuery

public static org.openrdf.query.TupleQuery prepareTupleQuery(java.lang.String queryString)
                                                      throws org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException
Prepare a tuple query which uses the underlying federation to evaluate the query.

The queryString is modified to use the declared PREFIX declarations, see Config.getPrefixDeclarations() for details.

Parameters:
queryString -
Returns:
Throws:
org.openrdf.query.MalformedQueryException
